subject: Good afternoon and how're y
body:
Good afternoon and how're you doing today? I have something of mutual  benefit to discuss with you.
Kindly get back to me as fast as possible so I can disclose more details
on the subject.
Have a nice day and thank you. I look forward to reading from you soon.
Best Regard
Lucy Morkeh.

subject: Re:    Good afternoon and how're y
body:
Dear Lucy Morkeh,

I'm doing well, thank you for asking. I'm intrigued by your message and would be interested in hearing more about this opportunity of mutual benefit. Please feel free to share more details at your earliest convenience.

Best wishes,
Linda

subject: Re: Good afternoon and how're y
body:
i can't remember sending you an email respond from the email where the my
first message was received thank you

subject: Re: Good afternoon and how're y
body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I apologize for any confusion. I received an email from your agency stating that I was a winner in the US National Visa Lottery Program. The email advised me to contact you for further details. 

Could you please provide more information about the next steps I need to take? 

Thank you,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Linda
